Class ScoreEvent

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ScoreEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
implements java.io.Serializable

This event happens when the user's score is altered

See Also:

Constructor Detail

ScoreEvent

public ScoreEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                  IAnswer answer,
                  IScore score)
Creates a new ScoreEvent

Parameters:
source - the object that created the event
answer - the IAnswer associated with this event
score - the user's current score

ScoreEvent

public ScoreEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                  IScore score)
Creates a ScoreEvent that does not have an IAnswer associated with it (such as a reset event). This constructor is equivalent to ScoreEvent(source, null, score).

Method Detail

getAnswer

public IAnswer getAnswer()
returns the IAnswer associated with this event

Returns:
null if there is no IAnswer associated with this event

getScore

public IScore getScore()
Returns an IScore representing the user's current score
